targets.query:
from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime_format")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Uptime"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system" or r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers_running")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["engine_host"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_nice")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_softirq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_steal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load15" or r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> rename(columns: {host: "server"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp_c")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve2")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r.device + " " + r.model}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "buffered" or r["_field"] == "cached" or r["_field"] == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r.container_name}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r.container_name}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
SELECT difference(mean("nread")) AS "Data Read" FROM "zfs_pool" WHERE ("pool" =~ /^$zfs_pool$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("nread")) AS "Data Read" FROM "zfs_pool" WHERE ("pool" =~ /^$zfs_pool$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pool"] == "storage")
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nwritten")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pool"] == "storage")
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_bytes" or r["_field"] == "read_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "anarion-nas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "sda3" or r["name"] == "sdb1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "writes" or r["_field"] == "reads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "anarion-nas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "sda3" or r["name"] == "sdb1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskread" or r["_field"] == "diskwrite")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "iops_in_progress")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "anarion-nas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "sda3" or r["name"] == "sdb1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
